channel.title: Good source for a private server
channel.description: Hi if anybody could please recommend/list some good sources that I can download to make a private server. If its possible to get one that has all the standard RS2 quests, skills and NPCs with Construction skill or newer. Huge thanks in advance to anybody that can help.

item.title: Good source for a private server
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

It’s either you get a decent server without ‘features’ or you get a piece of laggy shit that barely works with tons of useless ‘features’.

Read full topic
item.source: Good source for a private server

item.title: Good source for a private server
item.dc:creator: @Cruiser Cruiser
item.description:
@Cruiser wrote:

Now theres a brilliant idea why didnt I think of it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 19, 2008, 07:06:58 PM[/size][hr]Hmmm well from what I found its just a framework which Id assume means its missing all the quest etc. yeah? I want one with all the standard quests as up-to-date as possible.

Read full topic
